```{r}
# Mixture of univariate Gaussians, bimodal
x = seq(-5, 12, length=100)
y = 0.6*dnorm(x, 0, 1) + 0.4*dnorm(x, 5, 2)
par(mar=c(4,4,1,1)+0.1)
plot(x, y, type="l", ylab="Density", las=1, lwd=2)
```
